mapper.insert: insert into sys_role_enter (role_code, enter_code, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_role_enter set create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where role_code = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enter_code = #{enterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select role_code, enter_code, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_role_enter
select role_code, enter_code from sys_role_enter where role_code = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
